description: API used to call the upload of Chinese video advertisement.

parameters.name: postal_id
parameters.description: Product ID is generated upon registration is successful.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Signature Generation time, Unix timestamp format. Example: 1613608833

parameters.name: video_upload_id
parameters.description: Frequency of the current post, starts from 0

parameters.name: part_content
parameters.description: The content of this part of file, Part size should be equals with partition_length

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Status error details if the error. Empty if no validation errors

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

error_codes.description: There is an error, linear or input

notes: The documentation includes multiple error codes and examples in different programming languages (Java, PHP, CURL, Python). There are also different URLs provided for Chinese Mainland and Global regions.
